title: 223 - Survive & Advance
description:
Two people can live in the same environment and live two totally different experiences. A powerful statement made on today’s podcast by ET. During this pandemic the guys talk about how COVID-19 has affected the African American community at a higher and rapid rate. ET makes the correlation between this fact and why he and squad preaches about becoming a part of the 1%. Not from a financial standpoint but from a holistic standpoint. Being mentally fit, emotionally fit, physically fit, and being fit in your relationships. Today’s podcast will put what it REALLY means to be a part of the 1%. 
 The Secret to Success Topics:
  [03:33] - Trey’s Comedy Corner 
 [08:20] - Fair or Foul
 [17:50] - Is It Too Early
 [30:00] - Mindset
 [44:00] - RISE
 [50:00] - 90 years
 [1:10:00] - Giving Back
  Listener Perks:
  The Prescription Album
 Organifi is giving our listeners 20% off of their order just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime anywhere while on the go.
 Text ET at 313-251-1181 and follow us on IG @S2SPodcast
  Secrets 2 Success:
  Your bank account has muscle memory just like your body.
 The easiest transition to make is within the mindset. 
 Enhance your life and your families life so you can become bullet proof in certain situations. 
 Success is already in YOUR DNA.
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embody the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.
